text:
Dear HS Devs,
I am not able to figure out why the only two properties i can choose from to set a page slug are SKU or RECORD ID in my case? I would prefer the NAME property for instance because this is much more telling and better for for instance the site maps..

Late to the party here <@U04T2CUCP8T> but you can do this in a couple minutes with <http://hightouch.com|hightouch>. First destination is also free. <https://hightouch.com/docs/destinations/HubSpot|Docs here>.
LMK if you have any questions!
Yo <@U03EQ2Y3L3X> better late than never. Interesting tool
